long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elevate your X experience with X Profile Notes, your personal memory bank while using X. This powerful extension lets you attach private notes to any X profile, ensuring you never forget crucial details about your connections. With a sleek, collapsible sidebar and generous 16,000-character limit per profile, it's perfect for networking, research, or keeping tabs on your favorite accounts. Whether you're a journalist, marketer, or avid Twitter user, X Profile Notes transforms your browsing into a personalized, information-rich experience. Don't let valuable insights or details be forgotten - utilize X Profile Notes instead.
